name: sparkgeo
tag_list: geoweb, map, earth, gis, google-maps, open-layers, location, web, html5
overview:
Sparkgeo

… ignite your world

At sparkgeo we take your ideas and give them location. We will take your data and morph it into a map which is both compelling and functional. You will better leverage your investments in data and help spread your message.

Let us help you better understand your own data and discover new possibilities!

Geoweb development :> Sparkgeo specializes in building geoweb applications. These applications are designed to leverage geographic data and provide a better way to interact with it. Geographic data could be GPS points, satellite imagery, old maps, addresses or anything with a coordinate associated with it. Adding value to your data by making it accessible.

GIS Analysis:> Geographic Information Systems help us understand our world by providing a cartographic context. We use a combination of industry standard, open source and bespoke tools to ensure we always have the best possible solution to your geographic question.

Let sparkgeo map out your landscape!
